vpl : POSIX Compatability Library

The vpl library provides platform-independent access to some functions defined by the IEEE POSIX Standards.

Developer

Fred Wheeler is responsible for co-ordinating significant changes to vpl. http://sourceforge.net/sendmessage.php?touser=360434
